comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Nikolay Iudovich Ivanov (Russian: Никола́й Иу́дович Ивано́в; August 3, 1851–January 27, 1919) was a general in the Imperial Russian Army during World War I." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nikolay_Iudovich_Ivanov

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you B-59.  We will add more details about General Ivanov to the description when we update.
